ApproxsimClient
Class Client

java.lang.Object
  ApproxsimClient.Client
All Implemented Interfaces:
EventListener, ApproxsimEventListener
Direct Known Subclasses:
MyClient
public class Client
extends Object
implements ApproxsimEventListener

APPROXSIM client controls communication between the simulator, the xml parser and the APPROXSIM map.

Updates the client with process variables.

Parameters:
pv - list of process variables. All elements are of type ProcessVariableDescription.

getProcessVariablesFromServer

public boolean getProcessVariablesFromServer(String serverName)
This method is used to obtain the process variables from the server. After the process variables are obtained the client is disconnected from the server.

Parameters:
serverName - the name of the server.
Returns:
true if the process variables are obtained, false otherwise.

Parameters:
connected - if true the client is connected to the server, if false it's not.

importXMLSimulation

public static ApproxsimObject importXMLSimulation(String filename)
Gets the root element from the specified file and tries to extract a Simulation descendant from it.

Parameters:
filename - the name of the file to import.
Returns:
the first Simulation descendant instance in the specified file or null if no simulation was found.

importXMLSimulation

public static ApproxsimObject importXMLSimulation()
Imports a simulation file specified by the user using a JFileChooser

Returns:
The first Simulation descendant instance in the user chosen file or null if user aborted or no simulation was found.
